fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicVariables: NY: number of real variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicAliasVariables: NA: number of alias variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAlgebraicVariables: NYINT: number of alg. int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAliasVariables: NAINT: number of alias int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAlgebraicVariables: NYSTR: number of alg. string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAliasVariables: NASTR: number of alias string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAlgebraicVariables: NYBOOL: number of alg. bool variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAliasVariables: NABOOL: number of alias bool variables, OMC

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.y_reset_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Internal connector for controller output reset

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.I.y_reset
ScalarVariable.description: Value to which integrator is reset, used if reset = Buildings.Types.Reset.Parameter

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.I.y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value of output (= state)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.Nd
ScalarVariable.description: The higher Nd, the more ideal the derivative block

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.Ni
ScalarVariable.description: Ni*Ti is time constant of anti-windup compensation

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.P.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.gainPID.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.gainTrack.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.revAct
ScalarVariable.description: Switch for sign for reverse or direct acting controller

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.xd_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value for state of derivative block

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.xi_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value value for integrator output (= integrator state)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.y_reset
ScalarVariable.description: Value to which the controller output is reset if the boolean trigger has a rising edge, used if reset == Buildings.Types.Reset.Parameter

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.I.initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3,4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3: initial state, 4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.I.trigger_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to use conditional connector trigger

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.limiter.limitsAtInit
ScalarVariable.description: Has no longer an effect and is only kept for backwards compatibility (the implementation uses now the homotopy operator)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.limiter.strict
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if strict limits with noEvent(..)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.reverseActing
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true for reverse acting, or false for direct acting control action

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.strict
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if strict limits with noEvent(..)

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.with_D
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean flag to enable derivative action

ScalarVariable.name: limpid.with_I
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean flag to enable integral action
